content.webTitle: Why Daypop has gone so wrong

fields.headline: Why Daypop has gone so wrong
fields.bodyText: Have you been wondering why Daypop has broken so badly? It's owner reveals he's on holiday in Italy - and can't do a remote fix. He gets back home on Friday (the 13th, wahaha). In the meantime, what on earth is the weblogging community going to write about?
